name: kelly keaty
text: Wonderful pizza. The staff was friendly and helpful. I made several changes to my pizza and they made the pizza exactly how I liked it. Great value for a quality product. The toppings were a bit scarce,  or this store would have received a perfect rating.

name: Liz Murr
text: I had a rough day and my mom surprised me by ordering me pizza delivered to my apartment (my mom is awesome). The employees at Papa John's were wonderfully sweet. They drew a cute little picture on the box and the delivery driver told me â€¦More

name: makyla fields
text: I ordered food from here tonight and my food was completely wrong, I asked for a large pizza with chicken, and garlic on the entire pizza and artichoke hearts on half. I also ordered a side of ranch. What I got was a pizza with chicken and â€¦More

name: Linda Seidel
text: Best pizza around for the money. The Works pizza is my favorite.  Love their garlic butter dipping sauce.

name: Swift Pain
text: Worst pizza in town. You can clear tell its employees are college students who are just working there because they have a pulse. They do not care about the food, or you as the customer. You will get food that is not cooked fully, cold, or â€¦More

name: xS0FAx17 FTW
text: We were in Corvallis moving our son into a new apartment and decided to order pizza.... We ordered  at 8:20p.m.... they said it would be about 40 minutes. At 9:40.... over an hour after, we called, and were put on hold immediately. 10 min. â€¦More

name: Rift PVP
text: Ordered here multiple times and every time they have been excellent in price, customer service, quality of food, and timeliness.  Have yet to have a bad experience.

name: F C
text: Over 1 hour wait time, terrible customer service. Completely ignored the delivery instructions and just left without even knocking on the door. Nothing. I had to call in, and then was told bogus "info" about my own building. Not even an â€¦More

name: To To
text: Gotta love the people that you talk to on the phone while placing an order. Ima just start being as rude as they are. Lol this is why they literally get no tips from me

name: Katelin Eldredge
text: I called to place an order and after asking some questions I heard the lady I spoke with making fun of what I was saying to one of her co-workers.  I'm a rookie at this and was wondering the best deals and what toppings they like. Not impressed with the service. :(

name: Austin Ortiz
text: Good prices and great taste ðŸ‘Œ

name: Linnea McLachlain
text: I called and asked for the number of Domino's and the man who answered just sat there in silence and then ended the call. How rude!! I expect better service from this place. â€¦More

name: Dustin Simpson
text: Thought we would try the place again now that they have new owners (again).  I was impressed.  Fast, friendly and yummy.  We will be going back.

name: Steve Peck
text: I'm so glad to finally see a Papa John's Here in Corvallis. I love this Pizza!!! Tip: Sign up online, they email mail discounts all the time.

name: Josh Reeves
text: Worst pizza ever. Box pizza better. Was cold an delivery couldn't find the house.

name: Mandi Carrasco
text: zero stars .waited hour and no food and no call . finally get call and call right back and said phone wasn't in service so we call papa johns saying he be there in twenty min . so we waited other half to hour later no show still so we call â€¦More

name: Lina Kim
text: Friendly people and delicious pizza. Always happy to go here.

name: Brenda Peck
text: Best pizza ever! Great services, friendly and responsive.  Top notch pizza, Greatly recommended.

name: Wes R.
text: I ordered today and has the wrong address when I ordered online. They (she was) were super busy but super helpful. I got my pizza.

name: Ravyn Drake
text: I love Papa John's always have but tonight went to see if I could order a pizza and they were closed, though it appears that it has to do with hiring as it appears that they need divers, love them all the same though.

name: Tiffany C.
text: We have ordered pizza here a few times, and it is delicious!

name: Michael Stephens
text: I always get great service here and the pizza is good.

name: CJ Ely
text: Good food but don't give an estimate of 15 minutes and turn it into a 30-40 minute wait.

name: Andrew Fuhriman
text: I normally I like Papa John's pizza, but the one time I got pizza at this location the crust was really burnt. I didn't want to chance getting bad pizza again so I never returned.

name: Jonathon B
text: I quit eating there when he opened his mouth about politics.  Any business owner should know that's a no no in retail...especially in a Blue city in a blue state...dummy

name: Stew Griffin
text: Ya super slow on hold 10 minutes. Then $15 pizza and 6 piece small buffalo wings came out to $32! That's some magic there, especially with no sales tax

name: Quinn Millegan
text: Papa John's still tastes the best

name: Alex Peters
text: They unhook their phone at 11:30

name: Rebecca Spores
text: Good pizazz for the price

name: Jason Cho
text: This Papa Johns is closed

name: Mochi the tortoise
text: So sad to have them closed.

name: Nothing Atall
text: Amazing workers

name: Zac C
text: Pizza is alright tasting.

name: Marnie Juana
text: Good pizza good deals
